com.embeddedunveiled.serial.vendor

Class CP210XbaudConfigs

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.embeddedunveiled.serial.vendor.CP210XbaudConfigs

  • public class CP210XbaudConfigs
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents the C structure 'BAUD_CONFIG' defined in CP210XManufacturingDLL.h header file.

    Author:
    Rishi Gupta

        Parameters:
